EmailTemplate.subject: New Website, But Product Still Kick SaaS | Visit the Brand New VMTurbo.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> VMTURBO.COM GOT A NEW PAIR OF FANCY PANTS. <http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=fancypants> In pants terms, we took an MC Hammer parachute nightmare, and turned it into a pair of tailored, moisture-wicking slacks. Looking good. Feeling good.
Plus, you know, the UX is way better now. CHECK IT OUT <http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=fancypants> Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
